article.title: Rockwell Collins Awarded Teleport Support Contract At Ramstein Air Base
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Army has awarded Rockwell Collins a three-year, $9.1 million contract to provide maintenance and field service support for the Ramstein Air Base satellite communications teleport operated by the U.S. Air Force. Under the contract, the company will provide maintenance services for the teleport and provide remote monitoring of U.S. Convoys in Iraq.
